Met Mary.text0: Oh, I see you've met Mary, huh? :D
Met Mary.text1: You want to start friendship with her?
Met Mary.text2: That's awesome. She's really friendly too.

Hi, Mary.text1: Gift her some chocolates she will surely appreciate it.

Way, way back.response1: I don't know if it's real.
Way, way back.response2: Frozen or not, I was not supposed to be here.
Way, way back.response3: I let my self go, now I cannot move away.
